transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Yes sir, Himanshu this side from IndiaMART head officer business manager. Senior senior sir yeah very good evening sir how are you?
Customer: Good evening fine.
Executive: What is this proposal that you have given me can you just explain my fellow has given me all the details but yes sir.
Customer: I was not able to understand the things okay kya mil raha hai mujhe kya ho raha hai kaise ho raha hai mujhe thoda bataiye.
Executive: Ji ek to humne current service jo apni chal rahi hai sir usko aap proposal diya aapko ek saal aur teen saal ka right jo same abhi trust ki services humne last year liya tha ek saal ka wo same services humne aapko diya TS uska ek saal aur teen saal ka humne aapko quotation bheja hai 45000 plus GST for one year and 90000 plus GST for three years means two plus one we have the offer to ye aapka 90000 plus GST mein teen saal ki services milegi aapko trust ki jisme aapko ek certificate milta trust trust se verified certificate jo hard copy bhi aapke India mart pe laga courier hota hai aapke office mein aur soft copy aapke catalog pe aapko isme jo weekly hoti hai wo 20 milti hai har sunday ko aur daily ka do bonus milta hai 34 ho gaya total aur listing apni jo hamare client unke sath rehti hai apart from the leader jo hamara premium service uske niche your voice is breaking first of all aap shayad headphones use kar rahe ho ya pata nahi mujhe kya hai
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Headphone nahi hai to the voice is not clear enough now it's audible audible nahi audible hai but it's just like ho raha hai to jisse wo samajhne mein dikkat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: To maine abhi current services ka price diya tha aapko ek saal aur teen saal ka isme kya facilities kya de rahe ho humko tum theek hai pricing do minute ke liye baju rakho.
Customer: Ji ji ji theek hai to isme 20 valid aur hafte ka har sunday ko 20 valid milti hai aapko.
Customer: Aur daily ka do bonus valid total 34 valid milega 34 weekly valid aapko trust me sir.
Executive: And roz ke do lead doge nahi saturday sunday kya bola aapne do roz ke do lead.
Customer: Do daily ka bonus valid hota hai sir theek hai plus weekly 20 har sunday to sunday.
Customer: Sunday to sunday 20 leads doge aap ji to sunday ka genuine kitna lead hota hai frankly speaking matlab mujhe samjhega.
Executive: Sir dekho genuine genuine to humne isko kafi matlab jo competition hai kam kar diya genuine 100% kahi nahi hota but ha at least hai ki ha 70 to 80% to hamari rehti hai so aapko results degi aur humne competition bhi kam kar diya sir kya hota hai pehle ek by lead ko 10 customer consume kar sakte the aaj ki date me usko panch kar diya sir keval customer will consume one by uske baad out of stock ho jayega.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji to ye aapka weekly jo package ka valid hai wo 34 hai aur mahine ka aapka 140 ho gaya plus aapki jo listing top pe aa rahi hai sir agar aap dekho to aapka jo hai siddharth enterprises mumbai ki company uske baad hamara sm trading ko jalna ka hi aa raha hai sir second to aapko inquiry ka flow aur calls ka better rehta hai to aapka by lead ke alava mujhe best kya karke de sakte ho sir
Customer: I just don't want to waste your time or even I might mera hum to aapke liye you are paid are sir aapko kya aap to baaten karne mein mahir ho aapko you are paid for it I am not paid for it so basically ek cheez samjho mujhe aapka bhi time waste nahi karna mera bhi nahi karna hai what best can you offer me mujhe de do no regret price de do kyuki we are looking for other portals also so mujhe
Executive: Clear bata dijiye number of fairs.
Customer: Dono de dijiye na mujhe ek saal teen saal dono de dijiye I will get main kuch na kuch jarur karwa dunga but mujhe I am not comfortable with this pricing very frankly number of leads bhi hai wo thoda sa isme na mujhe thoda puri working karke dijiye aap.
Executive: But sir we are your old client suno dekho abhi hum log pichle we are your old client you should offer some good offer kuch acha humko do hum bhi judna chahenge aapse but agar kya hota hai ki ek usme se lead jo aati hai na hamara jo experience hai humne jo dekha hai sara to usme bahut kam leads aisi hoti hai jo matlab fruitful hoti hai close hoti hai but anyway thoda ek presence hona chahiye we would not leave it.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To abhi matlab abhi isko hum confirm karna hai right isko hum jyada stress to karenge nahi right sir.
Customer: Hmm bilkul bilkul to hum dekho ek saal wale de do ek saal wale mein sir koi sir sir ek saal wale mein to jyada kuch hamare pass scope nahi hota teen saal wala main aapko best karke de dunga jo abhi hamara MRP 90000 lakh plus GST uske baad humne aapko 90000 plus GST diya hai ek saal ka jo aapka final aayega sir 50 ki jagah pe aapko 40000 plus GST de dunga.
Customer: Ek kam karo sunil sunil sunil just do one thing see basically problem kya hai phone ke upar bahut jyada discussion karne mein na main bhi ab mera email id le lo email id le lo mera.
Executive: Whatsapp pe bheju aapko mail id pe.
Customer: Mera mail id le lo na sir us pe dal do na aap bataiye whatsapp is for a time pass whatsapp business ke liye use nahi karta hu main cmo c for calcutta m for mumbai o for orange.
Executive: Sorry c m m o m for mumbai cmo cmo@tradeco.in.
Customer: Sm ha tradeco ha ha c pe c mail id pe aap address kariye baki niche kahi usko flow mat jane dijiye.
Executive: CMO@smtrade.co.in right.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi ek kam karo ye aapka number hai na main aapko sms kar deta hu sms kar deta hu mera.
Executive: Us pe nahi aayega sms aap mujhe ek bar fir se bol dijiye cmo@.
Customer: Cmo@ smtradeco.
Executive: Tradeco okay theek hai smtradeco.
Customer: Dotco hoga na dotco ya fir rightco.
Customer: Dotcom hai dotcom.
Executive: Acha dotcom okay theek hai csmtrade co smtradeco.com.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Cmo@smtradeco.com.
Customer: Done done done theek hai na theek hai ab sunil dekho aapko final karne ke liye baithe ho mujhe bhi close karna hai whatever best you can give me give it.
Executive: I will give you the best sir please do that.
Customer: Karna padta hai kahi kahi har jagah pe tumko ye nahi dekhna padta hai ji hai na thoda sa de do we close on this mujhe ek din ka samay dena padega aapko main isko close karwa dunga theek hai theek hai sir mujhe kuch
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants explanation of the proposal.

- Wants best possible pricing for the subscription.

- Wants to know the number of genuine leads.



Resolution:

- Explained the proposal for 1 and 3 years.

- Executive offered a discounted price for 3 years.

- Customer shared email ID for the quotation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send the quotation to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, pricing, buyleads, trustseal
